ğŸš€ This week brings a few new packages, mostly for larger airline aircraft like the A320 and Boeing 737, along with one that lets you explore Iceland. The 737 package introduces several missions to fly with the Boeing 737 Max, but make sure to check the description as some may require a third-party version of the aircraft. For those looking to add a retro livery to a modern A320, the America West Heritage package is the perfect choice.
